doc.title: Blood Bath: Blood Wrestling Volume I
doc.plot: Wrestling meets Horror in the first ever Blood Wrestling DVD event. Unscripted, unrehearsed and unpredictable. This no holds barred event stars some of the hottest indie actresses in horror today including Amy Lynn Best ("Abattoir") and April Monique Burril ("Chainsaw Sally") with Referee Melantha Blackthorne ("Countess Bathoria") and Ring Girl Sofiya Smirnova ("Abattoir") Live music performed by Ari "First Jason" Lehman and 42nd Street Pete as your announcer. The Special Edition DVD features the entire event recorded live at Genghis Con II: The Wrath of Con. Extras include behind-the-scenes, trailers and s special "Inside the Showers" Featurette!
